alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 11:02PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Santa Clara County through 1130 PM PST... At 1102 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Los Gatos, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Campbell, Los Gatos, Alum Rock, East Foothills, Seven Trees, Monte Sereno and Cambrian Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains
